attributes.action: Make social distancing of 2m mandatory for workers in  Supermarkets.
attributes.additional_details: To protect workers and ensure continuous running of the supermarkets
attributes.background: During the Covid-19 Pandemic, workers in Supermarkets should be protected. They are coming within 2 meters of customers, most of the times less than 1m. Make this legal requirements on Supermarkets.

rejection.details:
We think this petition is similar:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/306387
